The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 04 April is 41,518 (4,805.4 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 30 March, there were 203 new confirmed cases (23.5 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 23 March, there were 230 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 12% (27 fewer cases).
